languages.text: "Абордаж оказался опаснее, чем предполагалось. Как насчет увеличить мою награду?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
languages.original_text: "Абордаж оказался опаснее, чем предполагалось. Как насчет увеличить мою награду?"

traits.locale_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"
"This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

languages.text: «Esta misión de abordaje ha resultado ser más peligrosa de lo esperado. Creo que nos corresponde una compensación adicional».
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: «Esta misión de abordaje ha resultado ser más peligrosa de lo esperado. Creo que nos corresponde una compensación adicional».

languages.text: “这次登舰行动比预想得更加危险，我觉得我应该得到些额外补偿，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: “这次登舰行动比预想得更加危险，我觉得我应该得到些额外补偿，你说呢？”

languages.text: « Cette mission d'abordage s'est avérée plus dangereuse que prévu. Il me semble qu'une petite rallonge s'impose, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: « Cette mission d'abordage s'est avérée plus dangereuse que prévu. Il me semble qu'une petite rallonge s'impose, vous ne trouvez pas ? »

languages.text: 「このミッションは、想像よりも大変だった。追加の報酬はあるんだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: 「このミッションは、想像よりも大変だった。追加の報酬はあるんだろうか？」

languages.text: "Bu bordalama görevi, beklediğimizden daha tehlikeli geçti. Yapılacak ödemede değişikliğe gidilmesi gerektiğini düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu bordalama görevi, beklediğimizden daha tehlikeli geçti. Yapılacak ödemede değişikliğe gidilmesi gerektiğini düşünüyorum."

languages.text: "Diese Entermission hat sich als gefährlicher als erwartet erwiesen. Ich denke, eine Erhöhung der Vergütung wäre angebracht?"
languages.original_text: "This boarding mission turned out to be more dangerous than expected. I believe additional compensation is in order?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Entermission hat sich als gefährlicher als erwartet erwiesen. Ich denke, eine Erhöhung der Vergütung wäre angebracht?"
